definition: "Schließlich" is an adverb commonly used to express a sense of conclusion or finality. It is often employed to indicate that something is happening or has happened after a series of events or considerations. Additionally, it can convey the idea of an expected or logical outcome, emphasizing the ultimate result or resolution.

examples.german: Sie hat schließlich ihre Meinung geändert.
Schließlich ist er doch noch gekommen.
examples.english: Finally, he did come after all.

examples.german: Schließlich muss man auch mal Pause machen.
examples.english: After all, one also needs to take a break.

examples.german: Er hat schließlich sein Ziel erreicht.
